body:
It would be good if there error message provided more information to help debug the problem.

Doe spack generate a "global" error file that contains information about the process it is performing to help debug when things go wrong?

==> Fetching from file:///scratch/bsmith/spack/var/spack/cache/xsdk/xsdk-.1.tar.gz failed.
==> Trying to fetch from https://bitbucket.org/saws/saws/get/master.tar.gz
###### ################################################################## 100.0%

==> Error: Attempt to check URLFetchStrategy with no digest.
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
title: 100.0% ==> Error: Attempt to check URLFetchStrategy with no digest. ==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
